works.description:
UFC 142.  The embedded video players  
through the links below are offering copyright infringing copies of UFC  
142.  We continue to report this account after each of our events; yet,  
Google has chosen not take down the account. And, by the time you respond 

on Monday or Tuesday, the video has already been takendown.  Please take  
remove the videos through the following links, immediately.  Thank you
